actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the adjusted gross income threshold applicable in determining the deduction for medical care and to increase the mileage deduction for transportation for medical care.
short_title: Middle Class Medical Tax Relief Act

summary.text: Middle Class Medical Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) lower, for certain taxpayers, the adjusted gross income threshold for allowance of the medical care deduction; and (2) provide, when computing such deduction, for the use of the standard mileage rate for the use of an automobile for transportation for medical purposes.

titles.title: Middle Class Medical Tax Relief Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the adjusted gross income threshold applicable in determining the deduction for medical care and to increase the mileage deduction for transportation for medical care.
